snippet: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has given his players permission to celebrate the festive season but cancelled his own Christmas party ahead of the trip to Swansea City in the Premier League on Dec. 26....
lead_paragraph: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic has given his players permission to celebrate the festive season but cancelled his own Christmas party ahead of the trip to Swansea City in the Premier League on Dec. 26.

headline.main: West Ham Squad Can Celebrate Wins While Bilic Prepares
headline.print_headline: West Ham Squad Can Celebrate Wins While Bilic Prepares
